snippet: Mr. Vaske has been with the investment bank 28 years and is now a co-chairman, with Tim Ingrassia and Paul G. Parker, of the mergers and acquisitions team....
abstract: John Vaske, co-chairman of Goldman Sachs' mergers and acquisitions team, says he is retiring after 28 years with investment bank.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: Mr. Vaske has been with the investment bank 28 years and is now a co-chairman, with Tim Ingrassia and Paul G. Parker, of the mergers and acquisitions team.

headline.main: Goldman Sachs Deal Maker John Vaske to Retire
